text:
Hi all, I know we have a thread regarding react-player, but i didn't see a solution.

`import React from 'react';`
`import layoutStyles from '../../styles/layout.module.css'`
`import { default as _ReactPlayer } from 'react-player/lazy';`
`import { ReactPlayerProps } from "react-player/types/lib";`

`const ReactPlayer = _ReactPlayer as unknown as React.FC<ReactPlayerProps>;`

`interface FinHomeShortsProps {`
  `props: any;`
`}`


`const FinHomeGrid: React.FC<FinHomeShortsProps> = ({props}) => {`
    
  `return (`
    `<div className={`${layoutStyles.width2xl} max-w-[105rem] py-7`}>`
      `<div className='mb-10'>`
        `<h2 className='border-b text-5xl font-semibold pb-5'>Shorts</h2>`

        `<ReactPlayer url='<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysz5S6PUM-U>' />`
      `</div>`
    `</div>`
  `);`
`};`
  
`export default FinHomeGrid;`

I get the error attached any ideas
